Functions.Skin protecting: Helps to avoid the harmful effects of external factors on the skin
Functions.Perfuming: Used for perfume and aromatic raw materials

Functions.Antistatic: Reduces static electricity by neutralizing electrical charge on a surface
Functions.Cleansing: Helps to keep a clean surface
Functions.Foam boosting: Improves the quality of the foam produced by increasing one or more of the following properties: volume, texture and/or stability
Functions.Hair conditioning: Leaves hair easy to comb, soft, soft and shiny and / or confers volume, lightness and shine
Functions.Surfactant: Reduces the surface tension of cosmetics and contributes to the even distribution of the product when it is used
Functions.Viscosity controlling: Increases or decreases the viscosity of cosmetics

Functions.Antimicrobial: Helps slowing the growth of micro-organisms on the skin and counteracts the development of microbes

Functions.Emulsion stabilising: Promotes the emulsification process and improves the stability and shelf life of the emulsion
